CustomField.formula: if(ISBLANK(OtherStreet), "" , OtherStreet & br()) & if(ISBLANK(OtherCity), "" , OtherCity& ", " ) & if(ISBLANK(OtherState), "" , OtherState& " " ) & if(ISBLANK(OtherPostalCode), "" , OtherPostalCode & br()) & if(ISBLANK(OtherCountry), "" , OtherCountry)
CustomField.label: Other Address
